title: Gauge Theory and Skein Modules
summary: We study skein modules of 3-manifolds by embedding them into the Hilbert spaces of 4d ${\cal N}=4$ super-Yang-Mills theories. When the 3-manifold has reduced holonomy, we present an algorithm to determine the dimension and the list of generators of the skein module with a general gauge group. The analysis uses a deformation preserving ${\cal N}=1$ supersymmetry to express the dimension as a sum over nilpotent orbits. We find that the dimensions often differ between Langlands-dual pairs beyond the A-series, for which we provide a physical explanation involving chiral symmetry breaking and 't Hooft operators. We also relate our results to the structure of $\mathbb{C}^*$-fixed loci in the moduli space of Higgs bundles. This approach helps to clarify the relation between the gauge-theoretic framework of Kapustin and Witten with other versions of the geometric Langlands program, explains why the dimensions of skein modules do not exhibit a TQFT-like behavior, and provides a physical interpretation of the skein-valued curve counting of Ekholm and Shende.

AI.tldr: 该论文通过将3-流形的skein模嵌入4d N=4超对称杨-米尔斯理论的希尔伯特空间来研究其结构，特别关注约化holonomy情况下的维数计算和生成元确定。
AI.motivation: 研究3-流形skein模的结构，建立与4d超对称规范理论的联系，澄清Kapustin-Witten规范理论框架与几何朗兰兹纲领其他版本之间的关系。
AI.method: 将skein模嵌入4d N=4 SYM理论的希尔伯特空间，使用保持N=1超对称性的变形，通过零轨道求和计算维数，分析朗兰兹对偶对之间的差异。
AI.result: 提出了计算约化holonomy 3-流形skein模维数和生成元的算法，发现朗兰兹对偶对（A-系列之外）的维数经常不同，提供了涉及手征对称性破缺和't Hooft算符的物理解释。
AI.conclusion: 该方法阐明了skein模与规范理论的关系，解释了为什么skein模维数不表现TQFT行为，为Ekholm-Shende的skein值曲线计数提供了物理解释，并连接了希格斯丛模空间的C*-固定轨迹结构。

title: On the rationality of the Weil Representation and the local theta correspondence
summary: We prove that the Weil representation over a non-archimedean local field can be realised with coefficients in a number field. We give an explicit descent argument to describe precisely which number field the Weil representation descends to. Our methods also apply over more general coefficient fields, such as $\ell$-modular coefficient fields, as well as coefficient rings such as rings of integers i.e. in families. We also prove that the theta correspondence over a perfect field is valid if and only if it is valid over the algebraic closure of this perfect field. These two results together show that the classical local theta correspondence is rational.

AI.tldr: 证明了Weil表示可以在数域上实现，给出了显式的下降论证来确定Weil表示下降到哪个数域，并将结果推广到更一般的系数域和环上，同时证明了theta对应在完美域上有效当且仅当在其代数闭包上有效，从而表明经典局部theta对应是有理的。
AI.motivation: 研究Weil表示在数域上的可实现性，以及theta对应的有理性问题，为理解局部theta对应的算术性质提供理论基础。
AI.method: 使用显式的下降论证方法来确定Weil表示下降到的具体数域，并将方法推广到更一般的系数域（如ℓ-模系数域）和系数环（如整数环）。同时通过代数闭包上的有效性来刻画完美域上theta对应的有效性。
AI.result: 证明了Weil表示可以在数域上实现，给出了具体的下降描述；证明了theta对应在完美域上有效当且仅当在其代数闭包上有效；这两个结果共同表明经典局部theta对应是有理的。
AI.conclusion: Weil表示可以在数域上实现，并且theta对应具有有理性质，这为研究局部theta对应的算术结构提供了重要工具和理论基础。

title: Modular Weil representation and compatibility of cuspidals with congruences
summary: Let $F$ be a non-archimedean local field of characteristic different from $2$ and of residual characteristic $p$. We generalise the theory of the Weil representation over $F$ with complex coefficients to $\ell$-modular representations \textit{i.e.} when the complex coefficients are replaced by a coefficient field $R$ of characteristic $\ell \neq p$. We obtain along the way a generalisation of the Stone-von Neumann theorem to the $\ell$-modular setting, together with the Weil representation with coefficients in $R$ on the $R$-metaplectic group. Surprisingly enough, the latter $R$-metaplectic group happens to be split over the symplectic group if $\ell = 2$. The theory also makes sense when $F$ is a finite field of odd characteristic. We also establish the irreducibility of the theta lift in the cuspidal case as long as $\ell$ does not divide the pro-orders of the groups at stake and we provide a compatibility to congruences in this setting via an integral version of the theta lift.

AI.tldr: 将Weil表示理论从复数系数推广到ℓ模表示（ℓ≠p），建立了Stone-von Neumann定理的ℓ模版本，构造了R-系数Weil表示和R-辛群，证明了在ℓ不整除群阶时尖形式theta提升的不可约性。
AI.motivation: 传统Weil表示理论基于复数系数，本文旨在将其推广到特征ℓ≠p的系数域R上，建立ℓ模表示理论，这有助于研究模形式和表示论中的同余性质。
AI.method: 1. 将Stone-von Neumann定理推广到ℓ模设置；2. 在R-辛群上构造R-系数Weil表示；3. 当ℓ=2时，证明R-辛群在辛群上分裂；4. 建立尖形式theta提升的不可约性条件；5. 通过theta提升的积分版本提供同余兼容性。
AI.result: 1. 成功建立了ℓ模Weil表示理论；2. 证明了ℓ模Stone-von Neumann定理；3. 发现当ℓ=2时，R-辛群在辛群上分裂；4. 证明了在ℓ不整除相关群阶时，尖形式的theta提升不可约；5. 通过积分theta提升建立了同余兼容性。
AI.conclusion: 本文成功将经典Weil表示理论推广到ℓ模设置，建立了完整的理论框架，为研究模形式和表示论中的同余性质提供了新工具，特别揭示了ℓ=2时的特殊分裂现象。

title: Monoidal adjunctions and abelian envelopes
summary: We show how monoidal adjunctions can be used to prove the existence of monoidal abelian envelopes of pseudo-tensor categories, in particular, those admitting a combinatorial description with certain properties. We derive concrete general criteria that we demonstrate by giving relatively simple combinatorial proofs of the existence of new abelian envelopes for interpolation categories of the hyperoctahedral and of the modified symmetric groups.

AI.tldr: 该论文展示了如何利用幺半伴随函子证明伪张量范畴的幺半阿贝尔包络存在性，特别是那些具有特定组合描述性质的范畴，并给出了具体的一般性判据。
AI.motivation: 研究伪张量范畴的幺半阿贝尔包络存在性问题，特别是针对具有组合描述性质的范畴，为超八面体群和修正对称群的插值范畴提供新的阿贝尔包络存在性证明。
AI.method: 使用幺半伴随函子理论，推导出具体的一般性判据，并通过相对简单的组合证明来展示这些判据的应用。
AI.result: 成功证明了超八面体群和修正对称群的插值范畴存在新的阿贝尔包络，为这类范畴的表示论研究提供了新的工具和视角。
AI.conclusion: 幺半伴随函子为证明伪张量范畴的幺半阿贝尔包络存在性提供了有效的理论框架，所推导的一般性判据具有广泛的应用价值，特别适用于具有组合描述性质的范畴。

title: Primes and The Field of Values of Characters
summary: Let $p$ be a prime. For $p=2$, the fields of values of the complex irreducible characters of finite groups whose degrees are not divisible by $p$ have been classified; for odd primes $p$, a conjectural classification has been proposed. In this work, we extend this conjecture to characters whose degrees are divisible by arbitrary powers of $p$, and we provide some evidence supporting its validity.

AI.tldr: 该论文将关于有限群特征标值域的猜想从p-次特征标扩展到任意p幂次特征标，并提供了支持证据
AI.motivation: 对于素数p，当p=2时，有限群中次数不被p整除的复不可约特征标的值域已被分类；对于奇素数p，已有猜想提出分类。本研究旨在将这一猜想扩展到次数能被p的任意幂整除的特征标。
AI.method: 将现有的关于p-次特征标的猜想推广到任意p幂次特征标，并通过提供数学证据来支持扩展后的猜想
AI.result: 成功将猜想扩展到次数能被p的任意幂整除的特征标，并提供了支持该扩展猜想有效性的证据
AI.conclusion: 对于有限群中复不可约特征标的值域分类，可以将现有的关于p-次特征标的猜想合理地扩展到任意p幂次特征标，且扩展后的猜想有数学证据支持

title: The representations of the Lie superalgebra p(3) in prime characteristic
summary: Let g be the Lie superalgebra p(3) of rank 2 over an algebraically closed field K of characteristic p > 3. We classify all irreducible modules of g, and give the character formulae for irreducible modules.

AI.tldr: 该论文对特征p>3的代数闭域上的李超代数p(3)进行了不可约模的分类，并给出了不可约模的特征公式
AI.motivation: 研究特征p>3的代数闭域上李超代数p(3)的表示理论，特别是不可约模的分类问题，这对于理解这类李超代数的表示结构具有重要意义
AI.method: 使用李超代数表示理论的方法，在特征p>3的代数闭域上对p(3)进行系统分析，通过代数结构性质推导不可约模的分类
AI.result: 完成了p(3)所有不可约模的完整分类，并给出了这些不可约模的特征公式，为这类李超代数的表示理论提供了完整描述
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功解决了特征p>3代数闭域上李超代数p(3)的不可约模分类问题，建立了完整的表示理论框架，为后续相关研究奠定了基础

title: Mutation Of Matrices Over Group Rings
summary: We give a precise definition of mutation of skew symmetrizable matrices over group rings and relate it to folding and mutation of quivers with symmetries. These matrices can have non-zero diagonal entries and we explain a mutation rule in some of these cases as well. This new rule comes from a notion of a generalized mutation of an entire quiver or sub-quiver.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了群环上斜对称化矩阵的精确突变定义，并将其与具有对称性的箭图的折叠和突变联系起来，同时解释了某些情况下包含非零对角线元素的矩阵突变规则。
AI.motivation: 研究群环上斜对称化矩阵的突变理论，建立其与对称箭图突变之间的关联，扩展突变理论的应用范围，特别是处理包含非零对角线元素的矩阵情况。
AI.method: 提出群环上斜对称化矩阵的精确突变定义，通过折叠和对称性将矩阵突变与箭图突变联系起来，引入广义突变概念处理整个箭图或子箭图的突变，并推导包含非零对角线元素的矩阵突变规则。
AI.result: 建立了群环上斜对称化矩阵的突变理论框架，证明了矩阵突变与对称箭图突变之间的对应关系，提出了处理非零对角线矩阵的突变规则，扩展了突变理论的应用范围。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为群环上的斜对称化矩阵提供了系统的突变理论，通过建立与对称箭图突变的联系，统一了不同数学结构中的突变概念，并为处理更一般的矩阵突变情况提供了理论工具。

title: Representations of the modular group into the isometries of $\mathrm{SL}_3(\mathbb{R})/\mathrm{SO}(3)$
summary: We describe a connected component of the space of conjugacy classes of representations of the modular group $\mathrm{PSL}_2(\mathbb{Z})$ into the isometry group of the symmetric space $\mathrm{SL}_3(\mathbb{R})/\mathrm{SO}(3)$. This connected component contains the family of representations constructed by Schwartz via Pappus' theorem, as well as their Anosov deformations studied by Barbot, Lee, and Valério. We show that certain representations in this component (far from the Schwartz representations) are Anosov.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了模群PSL₂(Z)到对称空间SL₃(R)/SO(3)等距群表示空间的连通分支，包含Schwartz构造的表示族及其Anosov变形，并证明该分支中某些远离Schwartz表示的表示也是Anosov的。
AI.motivation: 研究模群到对称空间等距群表示空间的几何结构，特别是包含Schwartz表示族的连通分支的性质，探索Anosov表示的存在范围。
AI.method: 分析模群PSL₂(Z)到SL₃(R)/SO(3)等距群表示空间的连通分支，包含Schwartz通过Pappus定理构造的表示族，以及Barbot、Lee和Valério研究的Anosov变形。
AI.result: 确定了包含Schwartz表示族的连通分支，并证明该分支中某些远离Schwartz表示的表示也是Anosov的，扩展了Anosov表示的存在范围。
AI.conclusion: 模群到对称空间表示空间存在包含Schwartz表示族的连通分支，该分支不仅包含已知的Anosov变形，还包含新的Anosov表示，丰富了表示空间的几何结构理解。

title: Rankin--Cohen brackets in Representation Theory
summary:
The Rankin--Cohen brackets provide a basic example of ``non-elementary" differential symmetry breaking operators. They can be interpreted as bi-differential operators remarkable for reflecting the structure of fusion rules for holomorphic discrete series representations of the Lie group $SL(2,\mathbb R)$ and are intimately connected to classical special polynomials.
  In this introductory article, we explore the combinatorial structure of these operators and discuss a general framework for constructing their higher-dimensional analogues from the representation-theoretic perspective on branching problems. The exposition is based on lectures delivered by the authors during the thematic semester ``Representation Theory and Noncommutative Geometry", held in Spring 2025 at the Henri Poincaré Institute in Paris.

AI.tldr: Rankin-Cohen括号作为非初等微分对称破缺算子的基本例子，反映了SL(2,R)全纯离散级数表示的融合规则结构，并与经典特殊多项式密切相关。
AI.motivation: 探索Rankin-Cohen括号的组合结构，并从分支问题的表示论视角构建其高维类比，为对称破缺算子的系统研究提供框架。
AI.method: 从表示论角度分析Rankin-Cohen括号的组合结构，基于分支问题理论构建高维类比，采用表示论与几何方法相结合的研究路径。
AI.result: 建立了Rankin-Cohen括号的表示论解释框架，展示了其与SL(2,R)全纯离散级数表示融合规则的对应关系，为构建高维类比提供了理论基础。
AI.conclusion: Rankin-Cohen括号作为基本对称破缺算子具有丰富的表示论内涵，其组合结构和高维推广为表示论与几何的交叉研究提供了重要范例。

title: On mode transition algebras for $\mathbb{Z}$-graded vertex algebras and applications to bosonic ghosts
summary: We study the mode transition algebras and Zhu algebras in the setting of $\mathbb{Z}$-graded vertex algebras, with particular focus on the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 (also known as bosonic ghosts or the $βγ$-system). We show that the mode transition algebras of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 admit unity elements that form a family of strong unities in the sense of Damiolini-Gibney-Krashen. The existence of unities for the mode transition algebra of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 allows us to explicitly construct all higher level Zhu algebras of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2. We further analyze weak modules of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 induced from Zhu algebras, proving that every such module is already induced from the level-zero Zhu algebra. We then prove that all indecomposable reducible weight modules induced from a Zhu algebra are not weakly interlocked, and hence not strongly interlocked in the sense of Barron-Batistelli-Orosz Hunziker-Yamskulna. More generally, we show that the property of being weakly interlocked is preserved under the action of an invertible Li's $\mathbfΔ$ operator. As an application, we prove that all indecomposable reducible weight modules of the Weyl vertex algebra at central charge 2 obtained via spectral flow of Zhu-induced modules are likewise not weakly interlocked. These results clarify the role of being weakly interlocked in the modularity properties of bosonic ghost modules previously studied by Ridout-Wood and Allen-Wood.

AI.tldr: 研究了Weyl顶点代数在中心荷2时的模转移代数和Zhu代数，证明了其模转移代数存在强单位元，并由此构造了所有高阶Zhu代数。进一步分析了从Zhu代数诱导的弱模，证明了所有此类模都可由零级Zhu代数诱导，且所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的。
AI.motivation: 研究Weyl顶点代数（也称为玻色子鬼场或βγ-系统）在中心荷2时的模转移代数和Zhu代数结构，特别关注这些代数中的单位元存在性及其对模结构的影响。目的是澄清弱互锁性质在玻色子鬼场模的模性性质中的作用。
AI.method: 使用Z-分级顶点代数框架，首先证明Weyl顶点代数在中心荷2时的模转移代数存在形成强单位元族的单位元。利用这些单位元显式构造所有高阶Zhu代数。然后分析从Zhu代数诱导的弱模，证明所有此类模都可由零级Zhu代数诱导。进一步证明所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的，并研究弱互锁性质在可逆Li Δ算子作用下的保持性。
AI.result: 1. Weyl顶点代数在中心荷2时的模转移代数存在强单位元族；2. 利用这些单位元显式构造了所有高阶Zhu代数；3. 所有从Zhu代数诱导的弱模都可由零级Zhu代数诱导；4. 所有不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的；5. 弱互锁性质在可逆Li Δ算子作用下保持不变；6. 通过谱流从Zhu诱导模获得的所有不可分解可约权模同样不是弱互锁的。
AI.conclusion: 该研究阐明了Weyl顶点代数在中心荷2时的模转移代数和Zhu代数的结构性质，特别是单位元的存在性及其对模构造的影响。证明了所有从Zhu代数诱导的不可分解可约权模都不是弱互锁的，这一结果澄清了弱互锁性质在玻色子鬼场模的模性性质中的作用，为先前Ridout-Wood和Allen-Wood的研究提供了理论支持。

title: Geometric wavefront sets of genuine Iwahori-spherical representations
summary: For Iwahori-spherical genuine representations of central covers with positive real Satake parameters, we prove the upper bound inequality for their geometric wavefront sets, formulated for general genuine representations in an earlier work by Gao--Liu--Lo--Shahidi. Meanwhile, we show the equality is attained for covers of type A groups and for some representations of covers of the exceptional groups. We also verify the equality for certain Iwahori-spherical representations occurring in regular unramified principal series; this uses and generalizes the earlier work of Karasiewicz--Okada--Wang on theta representations. Lastly, we determine the leading coefficients in the Harish-Chandra character expansion of a theta representation when its geometric wavefront set is of a special type.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了中心覆盖群上Iwahori-球面真实表示的几何波前集，证明了正实Satake参数情况下的上界不等式，并在A型覆盖群和例外群覆盖的某些表示中实现了等式。
AI.motivation: 研究中心覆盖群上真实表示的几何波前集，验证Gao-Liu-Lo-Shahidi早期工作中提出的上界不等式，并探索在哪些情况下能达到等式。
AI.method: 针对具有正实Satake参数的Iwahori-球面真实表示，证明几何波前集的上界不等式；对A型覆盖群和例外群覆盖的某些表示证明等式成立；验证正则非分歧主级数中某些Iwahori-球面表示的等式，推广Karasiewicz-Okada-Wang关于theta表示的工作；确定theta表示在特殊类型几何波前集情况下的Harish-Chandra特征展开的领先系数。
AI.result: 成功证明了正实Satake参数情况下几何波前集的上界不等式；在A型覆盖群和例外群覆盖的某些表示中实现了等式；验证了正则非分歧主级数中某些Iwahori-球面表示的等式；确定了theta表示在特殊类型几何波前集情况下的Harish-Chandra特征展开领先系数。
AI.conclusion: 该研究为中心覆盖群上真实表示的几何波前集理论提供了重要进展，证明了上界不等式并在多种情况下实现了等式，推广了先前关于theta表示的工作，为理解这些表示的几何性质提供了新的工具和结果。

title: The second Delannoy category
summary:
In recent work, Harman and Snowden constructed a symmetric tensor category associated to an oligomorphic group equipped with a measure. The oligomorphic group $\mathbb{G}$ of order preserving automorphisms of the real line admits exactly four measures. The category $\mathcal{C}$ associated to the first measure is called the (first) Delannoy category; it is semi-simple and pre-Tannakian, with numerous special properties.
  In this paper, we study the (non-abelian) category $\mathcal{A}$ associated to the second measure, which we call the second Delannoy category. We construct a new pre-Tannakian category $\mathcal{D}$ together with a fully faithful tensor functor $Ψ\colon \mathcal{A} \to \mathcal{D}$. The category $\mathcal{D}$ is the correct ``abelian version'' of the second Delannoy category. Like $\mathcal{C}$, it has remarkable properties: for instance, it is non-semi-simple, but behaves uniformly in the coefficient field (e.g., it has the same Grothendieck ring and $\mathrm{Ext}^1$ quiver over any field).
  Additionally, we completely solve the problem of understanding how $\mathcal{A}$ relates to general pre-Tannakian categories. We show that $\mathcal{A}$ admits exactly two local abelian envelopes: the functor $Ψ$, and a previously constructed functor $Φ\colon \mathcal{A} \to \mathcal{C}$. This is the first case where the local envelopes of a category have been completely determined, outside of cases where there is at most one envelope. This work opens the door to constructing abelian versions of other oligomorphic tensor categories that do not admit a unique envelope.

AI.tldr: 本文研究第二个Delannoy范畴𝒜，构造了其正确的"阿贝尔版本"范畴𝒟，并完全解决了𝒜与一般预Tannakian范畴的关系问题，确定了𝒜恰好有两个局部阿贝尔包络。
AI.motivation: Harman和Snowden先前构造了与配备测度的寡态群相关的对称张量范畴。实数轴保序自同构群𝔾恰好有四个测度，第一个测度对应的范畴𝒞（第一个Delannoy范畴）是半单且预Tannakian的。本文研究第二个测度对应的非阿贝尔范畴𝒜（第二个Delannoy范畴），旨在理解其结构和与一般预Tannakian范畴的关系。
AI.method: 构造一个新的预Tannakian范畴𝒟，并建立一个完全忠实的张量函子Ψ: 𝒜 → 𝒟。通过分析𝒜的局部阿贝尔包络，证明𝒜恰好有两个局部阿贝尔包络：函子Ψ和先前构造的函子Φ: 𝒜 → 𝒞。
AI.result: 成功构造了第二个Delannoy范畴𝒜的"阿贝尔版本"范畴𝒟，该范畴具有与𝒞类似的卓越性质：非半单但在系数域上表现一致。更重要的是，完全确定了𝒜与一般预Tannakian范畴的关系，证明𝒜恰好有两个局部阿贝尔包络，这是首次在存在多个包络的情况下完全确定一个范畴的局部包络。
AI.conclusion: 本文为构造其他不具有唯一包络的寡态张量范畴的阿贝尔版本打开了大门，提供了研究这类范畴结构的新方法和工具，对理解寡态群相关的张量范畴理论具有重要意义。

title: A numerical characterization of Dunkl systems
summary: We give a numerical characterization of weighted hyperplane arrangements arising from Dunkl systems.

AI.tldr: 本文对源自Dunkl系统的加权超平面排列给出了数值特征描述
AI.motivation: 研究Dunkl系统产生的加权超平面排列的数值特征，为这类特殊几何结构提供量化描述方法
AI.method: 通过数值分析手段，对Dunkl系统生成的加权超平面排列进行特征化描述
AI.result: 建立了加权超平面排列的数值特征化框架，能够准确描述源自Dunkl系统的这类几何结构
AI.conclusion: 成功实现了对Dunkl系统产生的加权超平面排列的数值特征化，为相关研究提供了量化分析工具

title: Isotropic meta Kazhdan--Lusztig combinatorics I: Ext-quiver presentation for the Hecke category
comment: 38 pages. arXiv admin note: text overlap with arXiv:2309.13695 by other authors
summary: We provide an ${\rm Ext}$-quiver and relations presentation for the basic algebra of the anti-spherical Hecke categories of isotropic Grassmannians, $H_{(D_n, A_{n-1})}$, in terms of cup-cap meta Kazhdan--Lusztig combinatorics and Temperley--Lieb diagrammatics.

AI.tldr: 本文提供了各向同性格拉斯曼流形的反球面Hecke范畴基本代数的Ext-箭图与关系表示，结合杯盖元Kazhdan-Lusztig组合学和Temperley-Lieb图论
AI.motivation: 研究各向同性格拉斯曼流形的反球面Hecke范畴的基本代数结构，旨在通过组合和图论方法给出其代数表示
AI.method: 使用Ext-箭图与关系表示方法，结合杯盖元Kazhdan-Lusztig组合学和Temperley-Lieb图论技术
AI.result: 成功给出了H_{(D_n, A_{n-1})}基本代数的完整代数表示，建立了组合图论与代数结构之间的联系
AI.conclusion: 通过组合和图论方法可以有效描述各向同性格拉斯曼流形反球面Hecke范畴的基本代数结构

title: Generalized Symmetries From Fusion Actions
comment: minor revision of the previous version; Prop. 3.10 and some references are added; some typos are corrected; Latex 44 pages
summary: Let $A$ be a condensable algebra in a modular tensor category $\mathcal{C}$. We define an action of the fusion category $\mathcal{C}_A$ of $A$-modules in $\mathcal{C}$ on the morphism space $\mbox{Hom}_{\mathcal{C}}(x,A)$ for any $x$ in $\mathcal{C}$, whose characters are generalized Frobenius-Schur indicators. This fusion action can be considered on $A$, and we prove a categorical generalization of the Schur-Weyl duality for this action. For any fusion subcategory $\mathcal{B}$ of $\mathcal{C}_A$ containing all the local $A$-modules, we prove the invariant subobject $B=A^\mathcal{B}$ is a condensable subalgebra of $A$. The assignment of $\mathcal{B}$ to $A^\mathcal{B}$ defines a Galois correspondence between this kind of fusion subcategories of $\mathcal{C}_A$ and the condensable subalgebras of $A$. In the context of VOAs, we prove for any nice VOAs $U \subset A$, $U=A^{\mathcal{C}_A}$ where $\mathcal{C}=\mathcal{M}_U$ is the category of $U$-modules. In particular, if $U = A^G$ for some finite automorphism group $G$ of $A,$ the fusion action of $\mathcal{C}_A$ on $A$ is equivalent to the $G$-action on $A.$

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了模张量范畴中可凝聚代数上的融合作用，建立了广义Frobenius-Schur指标与Schur-Weyl对偶的范畴化版本，并证明了融合子范畴与可凝聚子代数之间的伽罗瓦对应关系。
AI.motivation: 研究模张量范畴中可凝聚代数上的融合作用，旨在建立范畴化版本的Schur-Weyl对偶，并探索融合子范畴与可凝聚子代数之间的对应关系，为顶点算子代数理论提供范畴论基础。
AI.method: 定义模张量范畴中可凝聚代数A上A-模范畴C_A对态射空间Hom_C(x,A)的作用，其特征为广义Frobenius-Schur指标。证明该作用的范畴化Schur-Weyl对偶，并建立包含所有局部A-模的融合子范畴B与可凝聚子代数A^B之间的伽罗瓦对应。
AI.result: 证明了融合作用在A上的范畴化Schur-Weyl对偶；对于包含所有局部A-模的融合子范畴B，不变子对象B=A^B是可凝聚子代数；建立了这类融合子范畴与A的可凝聚子代数之间的伽罗瓦对应；在VOA背景下证明了U=A^{C_A}，特别当U=A^G时，C_A在A上的融合作用等价于G在A上的作用。
AI.conclusion: 该研究成功建立了模张量范畴中可凝聚代数上融合作用的系统理论，证明了范畴化Schur-Weyl对偶和伽罗瓦对应，为顶点算子代数中的对称性研究提供了有力的范畴论工具，揭示了代数结构与范畴对称性之间的深刻联系。

title: Some generalizations of Camina pairs and orders of elements in cosets
summary: In this paper, we investigate certain generalizations of Camina pairs. Let $H$ be a nontrivial proper subgroup of a finite group $G$. We first show that every nontrivial irreducible complex character of $H$ induces homogeneously to $G$ if and only if for every $x\in G\setminus H$, the element $x$ is conjugate to $xh$ for all $h\in H$. Furthermore we prove that if $xh$ is conjugate to either $x$ or $x^{-1}$ for all $h\in H$ and all $x\in G\setminus H$, then the normal closure $N$ of $H$ in $G$ also satisfies the same condition, and $N$ is nilpotent. Finally, we determine the structure of $H$ under the assumption that for every element $x\in G\setminus H$ of odd order, the coset $xH$ consists entirely of elements of odd order.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了Camina对的推广，探讨了有限群中子群H与群G之间的特殊诱导性质和共轭关系，并分析了相关结构性质。
AI.motivation: 研究Camina对的推广形式，探索有限群中子群与整个群之间的特殊诱导性质和共轭关系，以深化对群结构和表示理论的理解。
AI.method: 首先证明了H的每个非平凡不可约复特征标同质地诱导到G的充要条件；然后研究了当xh与x或x^{-1}共轭时的性质；最后分析了当G\H中奇阶元素的陪集xH全由奇阶元素组成时H的结构。
AI.result: 1. 证明了H的每个非平凡不可约复特征标同质地诱导到G当且仅当对于所有x∈G\H，元素x与xh对所有h∈H共轭；2. 证明了如果xh与x或x^{-1}对所有h∈H和所有x∈G\H共轭，则H在G中的正规闭包N也满足相同条件且N是幂零的；3. 确定了在特定奇阶条件下H的结构。
AI.conclusion: 本文系统地研究了Camina对的推广，建立了子群诱导性质与共轭关系之间的等价条件，证明了相关结构性质，为有限群理论中特殊子群对的研究提供了新的理论工具和结果。

title: Cup product of inhomogeneous Tate cochains, and application to tori over local fields that split over cyclic extensions
summary: In this note we give formulas for cup product in Tate cohomology in terms of inhomogeneous cochains. Using one of these formulas, for a torus T defined over a non-archimedean local field K and splitting over a cyclic extension of K, we compute explicit cocycles representing all cohomology classes in H^1(K,T).

AI.tldr: 该论文给出了Tate上同调中杯积的显式公式，并用这些公式计算了非阿基米德局部域上环面的一维上同调类
AI.motivation: 研究Tate上同调中杯积的显式计算问题，特别是对于非阿基米德局部域上定义的环面，需要找到用非齐次上链表示杯积的显式公式
AI.method: 推导了用非齐次上链表示Tate上同调中杯积的公式，并应用这些公式计算了在循环扩张上分裂的环面的一维上同调类
AI.result: 得到了Tate上同调中杯积的显式公式，并计算出了非阿基米德局部域上环面所有一维上同调类的显式上循环表示
AI.conclusion: 论文提供了计算Tate上同调中杯积的有效工具，并成功应用于具体代数群的上同调计算，为相关研究提供了实用的计算方法

title: The approach of cluster symmetry to Diophantine equations
comment: Modify the algorithm in Section 5 to make it more readable
summary: This paper aims to employ a cluster-theoretic approach to provide a class of Diophantine equations whose solutions can be obtained by starting from initial solutions through mutations. We establish a novel framework bridging cluster theory and Diophantine equations through the lens of cluster symmetry. On the one hand, we give the necessary and sufficient condition for Laurent polynomials to remain invariant under a given cluster symmetric map. On the other hand, we construct a discriminant algorithm to determine whether a given Laurent polynomial has cluster symmetry and whether it can be realized in a generalized cluster algebra. As applications, we solve Markov-cluster equations, describe some invariant Laurent polynomial rings, and resolve the questions posed by Gyoda and Matsushita.

AI.tldr: 该论文采用簇理论方法研究一类丢番图方程，通过变异从初始解生成新解，建立了簇理论与丢番图方程之间的新框架。
AI.motivation: 建立簇理论与丢番图方程之间的桥梁，通过簇对称性研究一类可以通过变异从初始解生成新解的丢番图方程。
AI.method: 1. 建立簇对称性框架连接簇理论和丢番图方程；2. 给出Laurent多项式在给定簇对称映射下保持不变的充要条件；3. 构造判别算法判断给定Laurent多项式是否具有簇对称性以及能否在广义簇代数中实现。
AI.result: 1. 解决了Markov-簇方程；2. 描述了一些不变Laurent多项式环；3. 解决了Gyoda和Matsushita提出的问题。
AI.conclusion: 成功建立了簇理论与丢番图方程之间的新框架，通过簇对称性方法有效解决了一类可以通过变异生成解的丢番图方程，并提供了判别算法和应用实例。

title: Geometrization of the local Langlands correspondence, motivically
comment: 27 pages. final version, to appear in Crelle
summary: Based on the formalism of rigid-analytic motives of Ayoub--Gallauer--Vezzani, we extend our previous work with Fargues from $\ell$-adic sheaves to motivic sheaves. In particular, we prove independence of $\ell$ of the $L$-parameters constructed there.

AI.tldr: 该研究将先前关于ℓ-adic层的成果扩展到motivic层，证明了L-参数与ℓ无关
AI.motivation: 基于Ayoub-Gallauer-Vezzani的刚性解析motives形式体系，将Fargues等人的先前工作从ℓ-adic层推广到motivic层，旨在建立更一般的理论框架
AI.method: 利用刚性解析motives的形式体系，将ℓ-adic层的构造方法扩展到motivic层，通过motivic理论的方法处理相关参数
AI.result: 成功证明了先前构造的L-参数与ℓ无关，即这些参数不依赖于特定的素数ℓ的选择
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了motivic层理论框架下的L-参数理论，证明了其独立性，为相关几何表示论研究提供了更稳固的基础

title: $N=1$ super Virasoro tensor categories
comment: Minor revisions for clarity and references updated. Final version, to appear in Communications in Mathematical Physics
summary:
We show that the category of $C_1$-cofinite modules for the universal $N=1$ super Virasoro vertex operator superalgebra $\mathcal{S}(c,0)$ at any central charge $c$ is locally finite and admits the vertex algebraic braided tensor category structure of Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang. For central charges $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)=\frac{15}{2}-3(t+t^{-1})$ with $t\notin\mathbb{Q}$, we show that this tensor category is semisimple, rigid, and slightly degenerate, and we determine its fusion rules. For central charge $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(1)=\frac{3}{2}$, we show that this tensor category is rigid and that its simple modules have the same fusion rules as $\mathrm{Rep}\,\mathfrak{osp}(1\vert 2)$, in agreement with earlier fusion rule calculations of Milas. Finally, for the remaining central charges $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)$ with $t\in \mathbb{Q}^\times$, we show that the simple $\mathcal{S}(c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t),0)$-module $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ of lowest conformal weight $h^{\mathfrak{ns}}_{2,2}(t)=\frac{3(t-1)^2}{8t}$ is rigid and self-dual, except possibly when $t^{\pm 1}$ is a negative integer or when $c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t)$ is the central charge of a rational $N=1$ superconformal minimal model.
  As $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ is expected to generate the category of $C_1$-cofinite $\mathcal{S}(c^{\mathfrak{ns}}(t),0)$-modules under fusion, rigidity of $\mathcal{S}_{2,2}$ is the first key step to proving rigidity of this category for general $t\in\mathbb{Q}^\times$.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数在任意中心荷下的C1-余有限模范畴，证明了其局部有限性并建立了张量范畴结构。针对不同中心荷参数，分析了该范畴的半单性、刚性、退化性及融合规则。
AI.motivation: 研究N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数的表示理论，特别是其C1-余有限模范畴的张量范畴结构，这对于理解超共形场论的代数结构具有重要意义。需要确定该范畴在不同中心荷下的性质，包括半单性、刚性和融合规则。
AI.method: 使用Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang的顶点代数辫化张量范畴理论框架，分析C1-余有限模范畴的结构。针对不同参数情况（无理数t、t=1、有理数t）分别进行研究，通过计算融合规则和验证刚性条件来探索范畴性质。
AI.result:
1. 对于任意中心荷c，C1-余有限模范畴是局部有限的，并具有Huang-Lepowsky-Zhang的顶点代数辫化张量范畴结构。
2. 当t∉ℚ时，该张量范畴是半单、刚性和轻微退化的，并确定了其融合规则。
3. 当c=3/2时，范畴是刚性的，其简单模的融合规则与𝔬𝔰𝔭(1|2)的表示范畴相同。
4. 对于有理数t，证明了简单模𝒮_{2,2}是刚性和自对偶的（除特殊情况外），这是证明整个范畴刚性的关键步骤。
AI.conclusion: 该研究系统建立了N=1超Virasoro顶点算子超代数C1-余有限模范畴的张量范畴理论，为理解超共形场论的代数结构提供了重要基础。特别地，证明了𝒮_{2,2}模的刚性是构建整个范畴刚性理论的关键，为后续研究有理数t参数下的完整刚性理论奠定了基础。

title: Counting points on generic character varieties
comment: Final Version. To appear in Mathematics Research Letters. Updated references
summary: We count points on character varieties associated with punctured surfaces and regular semisimple generic conjugacy classes in reductive groups. We find that the number of points are palindromic polynomials. This suggests a $P=W$ conjecture for these varieties. We also count points on the corresponding additive character varieties and find that the number of points are also polynomials, which we conjecture have non-negative coefficients. These polynomials can be considered as the reductive analogues of the Kac polynomials of comet-shaped quivers.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了与穿孔曲面和正则半单一般共轭类相关的特征簇的点计数，发现点数为回文多项式，提出了P=W猜想，并研究了加法特征簇的点数多项式。
AI.motivation: 研究特征簇的点计数问题，探索其多项式性质，为P=W猜想提供证据，并建立与Kac多项式的联系。
AI.method: 通过计数与穿孔曲面和正则半单一般共轭类相关的特征簇的点数，分析其多项式结构，并与加法特征簇的点数进行比较。
AI.result: 发现特征簇的点数为回文多项式，加法特征簇的点数也为多项式，这些多项式可视为彗星形箭图的Kac多项式的约化类似物。
AI.conclusion: 特征簇的点计数具有回文多项式性质，支持P=W猜想；加法特征簇的多项式系数可能非负，建立了与Kac多项式的联系。

title: A combinatorial interpretation of the Bernstein degree of unitary highest weight modules
comment: 33 pages; clarifies and generalizes the result in Version 1. Certain parts of the exposition overlap with our paper arXiv:2312.16749, which contains further details
summary: Consider the $(\mathfrak{g}, K)$-modules $L_λ$ for unitary highest weight representations of the real reductive group $G_{\mathbb{R}} = \operatorname{U}(p,q)$, $\operatorname{Mp}(2n, \mathbb{R})$, or $\operatorname{O}^*(2n)$, where $\operatorname{Mp}(2n,\mathbb{R})$ denotes the metaplectic double cover of $\operatorname{Sp}(2n,\mathbb{R})$. Let $k$ be a positive integer. Corresponding to $G_{\mathbb{R}}$ via Howe duality is the compact group $\operatorname{U}(k)$, $\operatorname{O}(k)$, or $\operatorname{Sp}(k)$, respectively, for which every irreducible representation $σ$ corresponds to a unique $L_λ = L_{λ(σ)}$. Nishiyama-Ochiai-Taniguchi (2001) expressed the Bernstein degree $\operatorname{Deg} L_{λ(σ)}$ as the product of $\dim σ$ and the degree of the associated variety of $L_{λ(σ)}$; this result is valid when $k \leq r :=$ the real rank of $G_{\mathbb{R}}$. In this paper, for arbitrary $k$, we give a new combinatorial interpretation $\operatorname{Deg} L_{λ(σ)} = \#(\mathcal{Q}_k(σ) \times \mathcal{P}_k)$, where $\mathcal{Q}_k(σ)$ is a certain set of semistandard tableaux, whose cardinality (for $k \geq r$) interpolates between $\dim σ$ and the dimension of the simple $K$-module with highest weight $λ(σ)$. The set $\mathcal{P}_k$ consists of certain plane partitions that encode the Hilbert series of the associated variety. We exhibit analogous sets $\mathcal{P}_k$ of plane partitions for all real reductive groups of Hermitian type, including the exceptional groups.

AI.tldr: 该论文研究了实约化群Gℝ的酉最高权表示Lλ的Bernstein度，给出了一个与k无关的新组合解释，将Deg Lλ(σ)表示为半标准Young表和平面分拆集合的笛卡尔积的基数。
AI.motivation: Nishiyama-Ochiai-Taniguchi (2001) 将Bernstein度Deg Lλ(σ)表示为dim σ与相关簇度的乘积，但该结果仅适用于k ≤ r（Gℝ的实秩）的情况。本文旨在为任意k值提供一个新的组合解释，突破原有结果的限制。
AI.method: 通过引入两个组合集合：Qk(σ)（特定半标准Young表集合）和Pk（编码相关簇Hilbert级数的平面分拆集合），将Deg Lλ(σ)表示为这两个集合笛卡尔积的基数。该方法适用于所有Hermitian型实约化群，包括例外群。
AI.result: 对于任意k值，成功建立了Deg Lλ(σ) = #(Qk(σ) × Pk)的新组合公式。当k ≥ r时，Qk(σ)的基数在dim σ和具有最高权λ(σ)的简单K-模维数之间插值。同时为所有Hermitian型实约化群构造了相应的Pk集合。
AI.conclusion: 本文为实约化群酉最高权表示的Bernstein度提供了一个统一的组合框架，突破了先前结果对k值的限制，并将理论推广到所有Hermitian型实约化群，包括例外群，为相关表示论问题提供了新的组合工具。

title: Differential operators on the base affine space of $SL_n$ and quantized Coulomb branches
summary: We show that the algebra $D_\hbar(SL_n/U)$ of differential operators on the base affine space of $SL_n$ is the quantized Coulomb branch of a certain 3d $\mathcal{N} = 4$ quiver gauge theory. In the semiclassical limit this proves a conjecture of Dancer-Hanany-Kirwan about the universal hyperkähler implosion of $SL_n$. We also formulate and prove a generalization identifying the Hamiltonian reduction of $T^* SL_n$ with respect to an arbitrary unipotent character as a Coulomb branch. As an application of our results, we provide a new interpretation of the Gelfand-Graev symmetric group action on $D_\hbar(SL_n/U)$.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了SL_n基仿射空间上的微分算子代数D_ħ(SL_n/U)是某个3d N=4规范理论的量子化库仑分支，并推广到任意单幂特征的情形。
AI.motivation: 研究SL_n基仿射空间上微分算子代数与3d N=4规范理论库仑分支之间的关系，验证Dancer-Hanany-Kirwan关于SL_n通用超凯勒内爆的猜想，并为Gelfand-Graev对称群作用提供新解释。
AI.method: 通过建立微分算子代数D_ħ(SL_n/U)与特定3d N=4规范理论量子化库仑分支的对应关系，在半经典极限下验证猜想，并推广到T*SL_n关于任意单幂特征的哈密顿约化情形。
AI.result: 成功证明了D_ħ(SL_n/U)是特定3d N=4规范理论的量子化库仑分支，在半经典极限下验证了Dancer-Hanany-Kirwan猜想，并建立了更一般的对应关系：任意单幂特征下T*SL_n的哈密顿约化也是库仑分支。
AI.conclusion: 该研究建立了代数几何与规范理论之间的深刻联系，为理解微分算子代数提供了新的规范理论视角，并为Gelfand-Graev对称群作用提供了基于库仑分支的新解释框架。

title: On rationality for $C_2$-cofinite vertex operator algebras
comment: 78 pages, final version to appear in Cambridge Journal of Mathematics, some major changes from previous version: Appendix A from previous version and proofs of some results already in the literature have been removed for brevity; Section 3.1 from previous version has been moved and combined with material from Section 5.2 to form new Section 5.3; new Section 1.1 on previous work has been added
summary: Let $V$ be an $\mathbb{N}$-graded, simple, self-contragredient, $C_2$-cofinite vertex operator algebra. We show that if the $S$-transformation of the character of $V$ is a linear combination of characters of $V$-modules, then the category $\mathcal{C}$ of grading-restricted generalized $V$-modules is a rigid tensor category. We further show, without any assumption on the character of $V$ but assuming that $\mathcal{C}$ is rigid, that $\mathcal{C}$ is a factorizable finite ribbon category, that is, a not-necessarily-semisimple modular tensor category. As a consequence, we show that if the Zhu algebra of $V$ is semisimple, then $\mathcal{C}$ is semisimple and thus $V$ is rational. The proofs of these theorems use techniques and results from tensor categories together with the method of Moore-Seiberg and Huang for deriving identities of two-point genus-one correlation functions associated to $V$. We give two main applications. First, we prove the conjecture of Kac-Wakimoto and Arakawa that $C_2$-cofinite affine $W$-algebras obtained via quantum Drinfeld-Sokolov reduction of admissible-level affine vertex algebras are strongly rational. The proof uses the recent result of Arakawa and van Ekeren that such $W$-algebras have semisimple (Ramond twisted) Zhu algebras. Second, we use our rigidity results to reduce the "coset rationality problem" to the problem of $C_2$-cofiniteness for the coset. That is, given a vertex operator algebra inclusion $U\otimes V\hookrightarrow A$ with $A$, $U$ strongly rational and $U$, $V$ a pair of mutual commutant subalgebras in $A$, we show that $V$ is also strongly rational provided it is $C_2$-cofinite.

AI.tldr: 该论文证明了在特定条件下，顶点算子代数的分级限制广义模范畴是刚性张量范畴，甚至是因子化有限带范畴（即非半单模张量范畴）。主要应用包括证明了Kac-Wakimoto和Arakawa关于C2-余有限仿射W-代数的猜想，以及将"陪集有理性问题"简化为陪集的C2-余有限性问题。
AI.motivation: 研究顶点算子代数模范畴的刚性结构，特别是对于C2-余有限但可能非有理的顶点算子代数。目标是建立这类代数的模范畴的刚性张量结构，并应用于解决仿射W-代数的强有理性和陪集有理性问题。
AI.method: 结合张量范畴的技术和结果，使用Moore-Seiberg和Huang的方法推导与顶点算子代数相关的两点亏格一关联函数的恒等式。通过分析S-变换和特征标的关系来证明范畴的刚性结构。
AI.result: 1. 如果V的特征标的S-变换是V-模特征标的线性组合，则分级限制广义V-模范畴是刚性张量范畴。2. 如果该范畴是刚性的，则它是因子化有限带范畴（即非半单模张量范畴）。3. 如果V的Zhu代数是半单的，则该范畴是半单的，从而V是有理的。
AI.conclusion: 论文建立了C2-余有限顶点算子代数模范畴的刚性理论，并成功应用于证明仿射W-代数的强有理性和简化陪集有理性问题。这些结果为理解非有理顶点算子代数的表示理论提供了重要工具。
